entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.9°C
Wind: SSE 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
